General.Name: Taiwan Taffeta Fabric Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Taffeta Fabric Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of polyester fabrics in Taiwan. The company provides polyester, nylon, recycled, and interlaced/blended materials. It also produces jacquard, triple cloth, and heavy fabrics, as well as moisture wicking, waterproof and breathable, stretch, thermal, cooling, anti-odor and antibacterial, skin-friendly and comfort, and UV cut fabrics. The company's products are used in smart casual, urban outdoor, and furniture and bedding applications. Taiwan Taffeta Fabric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 70-1 Xinung North Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 103601
